title: Patch 9
content:
attered Sanctum. Fixed Gekh Coal's hair floating when Prone and viewed from afar. Fixed bugs like floating objects and transparent roofs.

Withers' tomb no longer remains shrouded in darkness after you open the door. Patched a shortcut that allowed you to Misty Step straight to the lowest hallway in the Arcane Tower.
